mnd7:16.13: araññavanapatthāni → araññe vanapatthāni (bj) | manussarāhasseyyakāni → manussarāhaseyyakāni (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd7:28.3: nānābhisaṅkhāre → nānābhisaṅkhārehi (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | ajjhosannā → ajjhopannā (bj, sya-all); ajjhosānā (pts-vp-pli1)
mnd7:57.1: tāmaliṁ → kamaliṁ (sya-all); tamaliṁ (pts-vp-pli1); taṁmaliṁ (mr) | tambapāṇiṁ → tambapaṇṇiṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1 mnd15:58 [Attadaṇḍasuttaniddesa]) | paramayonaṁ → pinaṁ (sya-all) | gacchati, vinakaṁ → allasandaṁ gacchati navakaṁ (bj); allasandaṁ gacchati (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | gacchati, mūlapadaṁ gacchati → etthantare pāṭho sya-all potthakesu
mnd7:79.4: ānaṇyaṁ → āṇaṇyaṁ (aṭṭha.) | kantāraddhānapakkhandā → kantāraddhānapakkhantā (bj); kantāraddhānaṁ pakkhannā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
